DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide profound insight supraspinal neuronal mechanism network responsible low urinary tract ( LUT ) control verify , amend adjust neuronal circuitry model establish finding healthy subject context neurogenic non-neurogenic LUT dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Supraspinal Control Lower Urinary Tract Function Healthy Controls & Patients With Bladder Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: The subject recruitment perform within Neuro-Urology outpatient clinic Balgrist University Hospital collaboration Departments Neurology , Urology Gynecology University Hospital Zürich . The following subject group recruit : 1 ) healthy control ( n=22 ) , Non-neurogenic overactive bladder ( NNOAB ) patient ( n=20 ) , multiple sclerosis ( MS ) patient OAB ( n=15 ) , MS patient without OAB ( n=15 ) , spinal cord injury ( SCI ) patient neurogenic detrusor overactivity ( n=24 ) . After inclusion , subject patient undergo one two functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) session . NNOAB patient might undergo additional fMRI session receive overactive bladder ( OAB ) treatment ( antimuscarinics , intradetrusor injection botulinum toxin type A ) . Spinal cord injury ( SCI ) patient neurogenic detrusor overactivity undergo additional fMRI session 5-7 week intradetrusor injection botulinum toxin type A. High-resolution anatomical image functional blood-oxygen-level-dependent ( BOLD ) -signal sensitive image acquire . In addition fMRI , diffusion tensor imaging ( DTI ) sequence record anatomical scan provide information structural supraspinal connectivity . Study endpoint change BOLD signal regard location intensity , structural functional connectivity ( FC ) previously describe supraspinal center involve LUT control , statistical difference change BOLD signal , structural functional connectivity patient healthy control . All acquire fMRI data transfer off-line workstation run BrainVoyager QX Statistical Parametric Mapping ( SPM ) Version 8 . The functional data pre-processed motion correction , spatial smoothing , linear trend removal , temporal high-pass filtering . With program statistical analysis graphical presentation result perform . The DTI record evaluate SPM8 , BrainVoyager QX program like Functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging Brain ( FMRIB ) Software Library ( FSL ) DTI-Studio . To estimate FC use SPM8 brain connectivity toolbox . Both software allow estimation rest- task-related connectivity single subject group level correct statistical threshold . Overall , 96 subject main study estimate sufficient demonstrate significant difference group .
